title: Natpukillai Ellai Lyrics Sridhar
stanzas:
Natpukillai ellai
ven megam pola vellai
nee vandha pinne
vaan mazhai.

kaiyyodu kai serthu
un tholodu thalai saaithu
naan pogum idam
sorgamae.

ada vaanam vegu thoorame
nam natpai patri pesume
vaa vaa
nam natpum rendaam thaaye
natpe natpe
ada dheivathirkkum thaevai

seo.title: Natpukillai Ellai Lyrics Sridhar
seo.description: Get the complete Natpukillai Ellai Lyrics Sridhar from Sridhar. composed by Rahul Raj and sung by Simbu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Sridhar, Rahul Raj, Simbu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
